column5: Do  you want to work internationally? The degree in International Political Economy will allow you to work either internationally or at home in an international position. You develop an understanding of the world affairs that shape our world in terms of society, trade, security, the definition of boundaries within regions and countries.

column9: 12 Months Full Time, 24 Months Part Time
